hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/oss_bar/webapps/oss_bar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Rebuilding DB to version ${VERSION} print print cd /opt/checkouts/oss_bar/grails-app/migrations/cisys
echo "@genUser.MicroDev.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.55)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=dev004)))'
STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then exit ${STATUS} fi
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
print Beginning Rebuild from scratch on DB print ------------------------------------ print
./MicroDevDB.sh -a oss_bar -t oss_bar -i oss_bar -r ${VERSION} -e MicroDev -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.55:1522:dev004" -p DI4_OSS_BAR -u DI4_OSS_BAR -v
